in-progress.title: Transaction in progress
in-progress.description: This transaction is expected to take a few seconds to complete

failed.title: Transaction failed
failed.description: Transaction has been reverted by the EVM

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.total-collateral-tooltip: The total amount of all collateralized value locked in the protocol at this time. Liquidated collateral is not included in this statistic.
analytics.total-borrow-tooltip: The total amount of borrowed HAY in existence at this moment. HAY burned in the liquidation process is not included in this statistic.
analytics.total-borrowers-tooltip: The total number of users who borrowed HAY that is still owed to the protocol. Users with liquidated positions no longer owe HAY and are not included in this statistic.
analytics.collateral-ratio-tooltip:
A percentage of the user's collateral that determines the maximum borrowing limit for the user. 
 
Collateral ratio is always lower than the provided collateral, and is a key factor to prove that HAY is backed by over-collateralized assets. 
 
The formula is (total amount of HAY minted / total value of the collateral * 100), e.g. (66 / 100 * 100) for 66 HAY minted for 100 collateralized BNB.
analytics.current-overcollateralization-tooltip: How greater total collateral is than the total amount of borrowed {unit}. It guarantees every borrowed {unit} can be repaid by collateral with a large margin.
analytics.stabilization-pool-tooltip: The amount of HAY reserved to maintain HAY's redeemable value of $1 USD.

dashboard.title: Earn
dashboard.my-deposit-tooltip: Amount of HAY you deposited plus accumulated yield. This value recalculates every few seconds.
dashboard.apy-tooltip:
Annual Percentage Yield - is a representation of an interest rate, 
based on a compounding period of one year.
dashboard.expected-interest-tooltip:
Estimated amount of income you receive 
in the end of selected period.

dashboard.net-borrowing-apr-tooltip: The effective interest rate for borrowing the HAY, taking into account borrow fee you have to repay and HELIO rewards you receive.
dashboard.rewards-tooltip: Rewards in HELIO tokens you receive for borrowing HAY.
dashboard.my-borrowed-funds-tooltip: Amount of HAY you borrow against appropriate collateral.
dashboard.borrowing-apr-tooltip: The interest rate charged on the amount you borrowed that you have to repay.
dashboard.my-collateral-tooltip: Collateral is the value that can be seized in case of exceeding borrow usage limit for its pay off.

borrow.title: Borrow HAY
borrow.borrow-apr-tooltip: The effective interest rate for borrowing the {unit}, taking into account borrow fee you have to repay and rewards you receive.
borrow.borrow-utilization-tooltip:
Percentage of your borrowed HAY relative to the borrow limit. The current borrow limit is 66% of your collateralized assets.
We suggest maintaining a borrowing threshold below 75% of the limit to avoid loan liquidation that may happen because of BNB price fluctuation. Read more.
borrow.caution: You are above a 75% borrowing usage. It is recommended that you decrease this by repaying loans or providing more collateral to lower the risk of a liquidation event

withdraw.title: Withdraw {unit} Collateral
withdraw.withdrawable-tooltip:
If borrowed HAY = 0, withdrawable balance = collateral value

If borrowed HAY > 0, withdrawable balance = (collateral - (borrowed / collateral Ratio)) * 0.95
withdraw.info: You can withdraw any amount if you choose to receive collateral in a liquid staking withdrawing token in the boxes above.
withdraw.withdraw-with-token: Receive collateral with {unit} for instant withdrawal with no amount limits.
withdraw.caution: You are above a 75% borrowing usage. It is recommended that you decrease this by repaying loans or providing more collateral to lower the risk of a liquidation event

liquidation.to-be-liquidated-empty: All positions ready to be liquidated are shown here
liquidation.close-to-liquidation-empty: All positions close to liquidation are shown here
liquidation.history-empty: All liquidation history is listed here
liquidation.liquidator-gets-tooltip:
When liquidating someone's BNB collateral, you get aBNBc instead. aBNBc is a liquid staking token that represents staked BNB plus accumulated staking rewards.
Just by keeping aBNBc in your wallet, you will keep earning rewards.
You can also unstake aBNBc at fair value on Ankr Staking or use it for DeFi strategies on other platforms.

subscription.title: Liquidation Alert System
subscription.description: Receive a telegram alert if your loan has exceeded the suggested borrowing limit 75% due to collateral price fluctuation. We encourage you to sign up to stay alerted and avoid risk of liquidation
subscription.step-first: Sign in on wallet end and copy the 6 digits verification code shown below.
subscription.step-second: Send the 6 digits verification code to Telegram bot to complete signup

warning.borrowing-threshold: We suggest maintaining a borrowing threshold below 75% to avoid a liquidation event. You can provide more collateral or repay your borrow.
warning.liquidated: Your collateral of {value} {unit} was liquidated at {date, time, ::hh:mm a} (GMT) on {date, time, ::MMMM d}, {date, time, ::yyyy}! This might be triggered by a drop in the collateral asset’s price, pushing your loan cost to exceed the threshold of collateral value.
warning.above-threshold: Helio Account Warning! Your loan cost exceeds 75% of collateral value. This might cause triggering a liquidation event. To avoid this, either add the collateral or repay your loaned amount.

exploit.can-track: You can track Helio Bad Debt Burn Progress in real time
exploit.cease-busd: Helio Protocol has ceased using BUSD as collateral. Please withdraw your BUSD collateral by 31.12.2023, 23:59 UTC time and borrow HAY with other collateral.
exploit.suspended: Due to exploit of HAY collateral mechanism service was temporarily suspended.
exploit.announcement: Before the official announcement, please do not participate in the transaction of HAY to avoid unnecessary losses.
exploit.keep-updated: We keep you updated on Twitter:
